alert.note: Alert for Southeastern Brooks Range (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 23 at 11:54AM AKST until February 24 at 6:00AM AKST by NWS Fairbanks
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 AM AKST FRIDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow. Additional snow accumulations of 8 to 16 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Southeastern Brooks Range from Chandalar Lake west. * WHEN...Until 6 AM AKST Friday. * IMPACTS...Travel could be very difficult to impossible. Areas of blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The cold wind chills as low as 30 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing snow with poor visibility and snow drifts may impact travel in the area.
info.instruction: A Winter Storm Warning for snow means severe winter weather conditions are expected or occurring. This will make travel very difficult or impossible. The latest road conditions can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
